column5: Heading up to Eagle for 8 days. Will do some fishing on LacSeul alsoin early July. Have fished the sioux lookout end, but nothing else. How is the bite this time of year? Which section might I have the best luck in - South or West? Are there any bays or specific regions that seem to produce the best? Thanks for any info you can provide. I am bringing up a friend for his once in a lifetime trip and would like to give him some variety.
